name: Automobile and Truck Dealers: Sales, Service, Repairs, Parts, and Leasing
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for non–face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell new and used automobiles, trucks, pickups, and
vans. These merchants may also conduct repair work and carry a
stock of replacement parts and accessories.
If the merchant’s primary business is to conduct repair work, use
MCC 7538.
